functions.name: currentDate
functions.description: Returns the current date with UTC time zone.

functions.name: currentDatetime
functions.description: Returns the current datetime with UTC timezone.

functions.name: currentTime
functions.description: Returns the current time with UTC timezone.

functions.name: formatDate
functions.description: Format the date according to the specified format. The pattern of the formatter contains of MM(month), DD(day), YYYY(year) and delimiter, they are case insensitive, such as: MM-dd-YYYY or yyyy/mm/dd

functions.name: formatDatetime
functions.description: Format the datetime according to the specified format. The pattern of the formatter contains of MM(month), DD(day), YYYY(year), hh(hours), mm(mins) and ss(seconds) with delimiter and they are case insensitive except MM, MM is case sensitive, upper case MM for month and lower case mm for minutes such as:MM-dd-YYYYdd-MM-yyyy T hh-mm-ss

functions.name: formatTime
functions.description: Format the time according to the specified format. The pattern of the formatter contains of hh(hours), mm(mins) and ss(seconds) with delimiter and they are case insensitive, such as:hh-mm-ss or hh:mm:s

functions.name: now
functions.description: Returns the current time with UTC timezone.
